structuredData.headline: Building an Image Gallery with Next.js, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS
structuredData.description: Learn how to create an image gallery with dynamic content from a PostgreSQL database, with support for content updates without needing to redeploy.
structuredData.image: https://asadbek.dev/api/og?title=Building an Image Gallery with Next.js, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS
